name: School of Intellectual Gamers
description:
Learning Through Play! With this relaxing game, we help you develop your intellectual knowledge in different areas. Read the articles first, then play the mini quiz games.

+ 5 Different Areas: History, Politics, Economy, Philosophy and Psychology.
+ Understandable information: A simple and easy way to learn by playing.
+ Minimalist Approach: Eye-catching design and illustrations.
+ Quiz Games: After articles, you can test yourself with interesting questions.
